actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE workers SET
		wname = '{{update_form.fieldState.wname.isVisible ? update_form.formData.wname : update_form.sourceData.wname}}',
		wsex = '{{update_form.fieldState.wsex.isVisible ? update_form.formData.wsex : update_form.sourceData.wsex}}',
    wage = '{{update_form.fieldState.wage.isVisible ? update_form.formData.wage : update_form.sourceData.wage}}',
		wsalary = '{{update_form.fieldState.wsalary.isVisible ? update_form.formData.wsalary : update_form.sourceData.wsalary}}',
		wtel = '{{update_form.fieldState.wtel.isVisible ? update_form.formData.wtel : update_form.sourceData.wtel}}',
		waddress = '{{update_form.fieldState.waddress.isVisible ? update_form.formData.waddress : update_form.sourceData.waddress}}'
WHERE wno = {{data_table.selectedRow.wno}};
